translations: v．叛逃，背叛：离开原来的国家、政党、组织等，加入对立的一方。
· He was accused of defecting to the enemy.
他被指控叛逃到敌人那边。

phrs.translation: 心房中隔缺损；心房间隔缺损

sentences.sentence: We've yet to see people defecting to the next big thing.
sentences.translation: 我们尚未发现人们有转向其他网站的迹象。

sentences.sentence: But subscribers are defecting from the firm in droves in any case.
sentences.translation: 但是，无论如何，该公司的订阅用户也在成批的减少。

sentences.sentence: “Our research suggests that customers are defecting,” says Mr Passikoff.
sentences.translation: Passikoff说：“我们的研究表明，消费者正在抵制”。
